name: Wikipedia (readable, hyphenation)
description: Improves the readability of the articles.
additional_info:
The menu on the left is hidden. Move the cursor to the left, to get it back.

Hyphenation only works with Firefox 8 and higher! Google Chrome does not support automatic hyphenation! (But Safari does! Try this great Safari Stylish extension: http://sobolev.us/stylish/)

Release Notes:
----------------------
v. 1.5
- added a searchbar at the top
- some small fixes

v. 1.4
- style is now also working on secure.wikimedia.org
- added option to change the background color (but just around the article, the background of the article is still white - and will stay white!)

v. 1.3
- changed first heading
- more space around the text
- change margins of boxes and images

v. 1.2
- added border around the article (thanks to http://userstyles.org/styles/37074/wikipedia-super-clean-stylish-article-viewer)
- added numbers to the headings

v. 1.1
- fixed bug with floating images

v. 1.0
- first version
